item.title: Things that you can not do without
item.description: A little list of essential tools: git GitHub and GitHub Pages possibly with Nikola or Hugo Bitbucket Dropbox (possibly with git repos inside, see here for problems) Mega with linux sync ipython ipython Notebook with GitHub and nbviewer Inkscape Kate Go Veusz Keep JuiceSSH Docker, Rocket (see also why Rocket)

item.title: Change a line in all of your files at once
item.description: Sometimes you need to change a single line in a lot of files. May be you made a mistake in your configuration files or you want to change the number of initial conditions to be generated automatically. With sed it is super-easy: sed -i 's/"Runs": 10,/"Runs": 50,/g' *.txt

item.title: Blogging with Nikola + Ipython + Git(Hub)
item.description: After a lot of different attempts now it seems that I’m able to run a static blog with Python, Nikola and Git.
